column2:
"Yes. That was magnificent;
not even the slightest deviation.
Of course, you passed this task."

"You are likely the first ARKS
I've taught to such a great result.
Let me thank you."

"I think you may be able to reach
a state of wired lance ability
no one has reached before."

"Please improve yourself from here
on out with that time in mind!
Until then!"
